about_the_game:
To the Kingdom aims to create a rich and immersive strategic board game experience, blending seamless video game mechanics with stunning, artistic visuals. Whether you're playing with friends, family, or strangers from around the world, this game challenges you to master its dynamics.

Easy to Learn, Hard to Master

Though simple to pick up, mastering "To the Kingdom" takes time. You'll need to be strong, organized, and occasionally ruthless to outsmart your opponents. Victory comes from understanding the finer details of strategy.

Claim the Lands

The lands are fertile, rich, and waiting to be claimed. Expand strategically by capturing the most advantageous territories, preventing your enemies from gaining ground. Disrupt their strategic connections, create chaos, and use it to elevate your position. But beware—circumstances can shift at any moment, so never get too comfortable.

A Deeply Strategic Experience

Like any great strategy game, "To the Kingdom" rewards careful planning. Every move from start to finish shapes the outcome. Each match offers new maps, enemies, and resources, ensuring every game is a fresh challenge. The key to victory lies in reading your opponents and adapting to their tactics.

Multiplayer Battles

Compete against strategy enthusiasts worldwide. Whether tasting the sweet joy of victory or learning from defeat, respect for your opponents is paramount, just like a true leader.

Breathtaking Visuals and Sounds

Beyond strategy, "To the Kingdom" offers a feast for the senses. Enjoy beautifully designed visuals, music, and an overall artistic experience that enhances your journey to becoming the ruler of a kingdom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual-Core Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 3.1+ Compliant
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 720p, 16:9 recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Dual-Core Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 600 series with 2 GB memory or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1080p, 16:9 recommended

short_description: Build your kingdom in this strategic multiplayer board game. Plan your cities and villages carefully, manage resources and cards wisely, and outsmart your rivals. Master the game’s rules and sharpen your tactics as you march To the Kingdom. Only the most cunning will claim victory!
